H0.text: What Carl Sagan television series was resurrected in 2014 with Neil deGrasse Tyson as host. Universe

H1.text: What Carl Sagan television series was resurrected in 2014 with Neil deGrasse Tyson as host. Nova

H2.text: What Carl Sagan television series was resurrected in 2014 with Neil deGrasse Tyson as host. The Planets

H3.text: What Carl Sagan television series was resurrected in 2014 with Neil deGrasse Tyson as host. Cosmos

A4.text: Cosmos: A Spacetime Odyssey (2014) is a sequel to Cosmos: A Personal Voyage (1980) presented by Neil deGrasse Tyson
